Text:
Many thanks for offering this great film. I have also ordered it on Amazon, but cannot wait until il arrives. Indeed a fine movie, and I still remember it after 20 years. That counts for quality in my book.

I also thank you for the fine introduction you present here to both the novel and the movie. I learned a lot from it.


And indeed, Delpy's beauty is nowhere more radiant than in this movie. Her acting was much better though in Kieslowski's 'White', a few years later.
